trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스를 사용하여 개별적으로 액세스할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection> is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush> classes to store <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop> information.

Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 멤버에 설명 된 대로 정확히 동작 언급 했 듯이 점을 제외 하 고는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, 및 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 설명서입니다.

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable 기능:** 에서 상속 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection> 클래스는 여러 가지 특수 기능을 제공: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection> 개선 하기 위해 읽기 전용으로 설정 하는 여러 개체 간에 공유 하는 대로 개체를 선언할 수 있습니다 성능, 복제 및 가집니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 다른 기능에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 참조는 [Freezable 개체 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Implicit Collection Usage
XAML Values
*oneOrMoreGradientStopObjectElements*
One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop> objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop> 개체 요소 구문을 사용 하 여 선언 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> class.
The collection to copy.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> class that contains the elements in the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 컬렉션에 있는 요소를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 처음 저장할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> 개체 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> class that is initially capable of storing the specified number of items.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 항목 수를 처음 저장할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> to add to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> to the gradient stop collection.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현에서 throw 한 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 추가 하려고 하면는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> has a fixed size.
Removes all items from the gradient stop list.
trans-unit.target: 그라데이션 중지점 목록에서 모든 항목을 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는의 용량을 변경 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> is read-only.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체 값의 전체 복사본을 만들어 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />의 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을 복사하는 경우 이 메서드는 더 이상 확인되지 않을 수도 있는 리소스 참조와 데이터 바인딩을 복사하지만 애니메이션이나 애니메이션의 현재 값은 복사하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 소스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성이 <see langword="true." />인 경우에도 복제된 개체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성은 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> 개체의 현재 값에 대한 전체 복사본을 만들어 이 개체의 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 리소스 참조, 데이터 바인딩 및 애니메이션은 복사되지 않지만 이러한 요소의 현재 값은 복사됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 소스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성이 <see langword="true" />인 경우에도 복제된 개체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성은 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
Determines whether the collection contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" />.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" />이 들어 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the items copied from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>배열</c>에서 복사를 시작할 인덱스입니다. 이 인덱스는 0부터 시작합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 대상 배열의 지정된 인덱스에서 시작하여 전체 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />을 호환되는 1차원 <see cref="T:System.Array" />에 복사합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of items in the source <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 소스 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />의 항목 수가 <paramref name="index" />에서 대상 <paramref name="array" /> 끝 사이의 사용 가능한 공간보다 큰 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
The number of items in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
This method implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count%2A> method from the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 구현 하는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count%2A> 에서 메서드는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반복할 수 있는 열거자를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator" /> that can iterate through the collection.
Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션의 데이터 읽기를 허용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 내부 컬렉션을 수정 하 여 열거자를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 처음에 열거자는 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목 앞에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: also brings the enumerator back to this position.
At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치에서, 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 예외를 throw 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 호출 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 하 여 열거자의 값을 읽기 전에 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>이 호출될 때까지 동일한 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.

After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 끝이 전달 된 후 열거자는 컬렉션의 마지막 항목 뒤에 배치 하 고 호출 되 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 반환 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 마지막으로 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 반환 `false`호출, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 예외를 throw 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 다시 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목을 호출 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> 이어서 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션이 변경되지 않은 상태로 유지되는 한 유효한 상태를 유지합니다.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 변경 되 면, 추가 하는 등 수정 또는 삭제 항목 열거자는 무효화 하 고을 다음에 호출할 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throw는 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 사이 컬렉션이 수정 되는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 열거자가 이미 무효로 되 었 하는 경우에로 설정 되어 있는 항목을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션에 배타적으로 액세스하지 못하므로 컬렉션을 열거하는 것은 본질적으로 스레드로부터 안전한 프로시저가 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 동기화 되어 있을 때 다른 스레드에서 수 수정할 열거자에서 예외가 발생 하는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 열거하는 동안 스레드로부터 안전을 보장하려면 전체 열거를 수행하는 동안 컬렉션을 잠그거나 다른 스레드에서 변경된 내용으로 인해 발생한 예외를 catch하면 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The item to search for.
Returns the zero-based index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" />.
The index if the object was found; otherwise, <c>-1</c>.
The zero-based index at which to insert the object.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> to insert.
Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> at the specified position in the gradient stop list.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" />을 그라데이션 중지점 목록의 지정된 위치에 삽입합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현은 throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 를 삽입 하려고 시도 하는 경우는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스(0부터 시작)에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> at the specified index.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,이 구현은 throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException> 를 삽입 하려고 시도 하는 경우는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the GradientStopCollection.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a GradientStopCollection into the equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
Returns the equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> to remove from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" />에서 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" />의 첫 번째 항목을 제거합니다.
